headline: Argus Initiates Coverage of DexCom (DXCM) with a Buy Rating
summary: DexCom, Inc. (NASDAQ:DXCM) is one of the best strong buy growth stocks to buy now. On August 21, Argus initiated coverage of DexCom, Inc. (NASDAQ:DXCM) with a Buy rating and $100 price target. The firm told investors in a research note that it sees DexCom, Inc. (NASDAQ:DXCM) maintaining above industry average growth, leveraging costs to […]
